data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kobe's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kobe.
In the minute 6, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 7, At Noevir Stadium, Kobe are penalized for being offside.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 11, Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
Kobe's Yuta Goke breaks free at Noevir Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Kobe.
Mateus gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nagoya.
In the minute 13, Great shot from Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas but he is denied by the crossbar.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Hiroyuki Abe (Nagoya) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dyanfrez Douglas (Kobe) has received a first yellow card.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 26, Ryuji Sato awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 31, Ryuji Sato waits before resuming play because Takuji Yonemoto for Nagoya is still down.
Takuji Yonemoto is back on the pitch.
In Kobe Kobe drive forward through Yuta Goke. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 37, Nagoya are caught offside.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Nagoya at Noevir Stadium.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Nagoya.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 45, At Noevir Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Kobe make their first substitution with Ryuho Kikuchi replacing Leo Osaki.
In the minute 47, Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 50, Dyanfrez Douglas for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 52, Free kick Kobe.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 54, Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a first substitution, with Yuki Soma replacing Naoki Maeda.
Nagoya drive upfield and Yuichi Maruyama gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kobe defender.
In the minute 55, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Ryuji Sato signals a Kobe throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Kobe are coming forward and Yuta Goke gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 56, Ryuji Sato awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya.
In the minute 58, Nagoya are pushing forward but Mateus's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Goal! Kobe have got their heads in front thanks to a Andres Iniesta strike.
That's a fine assist from Yuta Goke.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ryuji Sato awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Nagoya at Noevir Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Massimo Ficcadenti is making the team's third substitution at Noevir Stadium with Gabriel Xavier replacing Takuji Yonemoto.
Ryogo Yamasaki is replacing Mu Kanazaki for the away team.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Kobe's area.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas is on target but unsuccessful.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Nagoya just outside Kobe's area.
In the minute 78, Ryuji Sato signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kobe's half.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Kobe needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
Kyogo Furuhashi of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Oh Jae-suk is replacing Yutaka Yoshida for Nagoya at Noevir Stadium.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Dyanfrez Douglas with Noriaki Fujimoto. This is the second substitution made today by Atsuhiro Miura.
In the minute 86, Ryuji Sato awards Kobe a goal kick.
Yutaro Oda is on a sub for Kyogo Furuhashi for Kobe.
In the minute 87, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ryogo Yamasaki for Nagoya has been booked by Ryuji Sato and receives a first yellow card.
Kobe advance rapidly upfield but Ryuji Sato blows for offside.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kobe.
Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Ryuji Sato blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
